Tesla Announces Release Date for First Quarter 2015 Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Announces Release Date for First Quarter 2015 Financial Results Globe Newswire Apr 22, 2015 &nbsp; PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 04/22/15 -- Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) announces that it will post its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015, after market close on Wednesday, May 6, 2015. At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory release containing a link to the Q1 2015 Shareholder Letter, available on the company website. Tesla management will hold a live question &amp; answer webcast at 2:30pm Pacific Time (5:30pm Eastern Time) to discuss the Company's financial and business results and outlook. What: Tesla Q1 2015 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast When: Wednesday, May 6, 2015 Time: 2:30pm Pacific Time / 5:30pm Eastern Time Shareholder Letter: http://ir.tesla.com Webcast: http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company's website. For additional information, please visit http://ir.tesla.com .
